Chiu Pak Ki, Candy is a Multidisciplinary Designer and Front-End Developer. She graduated from Hong Kong Design Institute with Distinction. Specialising in interaction design and visual communication, her interests span on memorable immersive user experience journey and delivering design-driven solutions.
